ideas.title: Graph Database Support
ideas.description: Add support for Neo4j and other graph databases for complex relationship modeling

ideas.title: Time-Series Database Integration
ideas.description: Support InfluxDB and TimescaleDB for time-series configuration data

ideas.title: Edge Computing Database Support
ideas.description: Implement lightweight database adapters for edge computing environments

ideas.title: Blockchain Configuration Storage
ideas.description: Implement immutable configuration storage using blockchain technology

ideas.title: Quantum Database Adapters
ideas.description: Prepare for quantum computing era with quantum-resistant database adapters

future_considerations: Integration with A6 for database performance optimization
Coordination with A10 for enterprise security and compliance
Performance benchmarking against existing database solutions
implementation_insights: NoSQL adapters must handle schema-less data efficiently
Cloud integrations require careful cost optimization
Serialization performance is critical for large datasets
ML-powered optimization requires significant training data
Cross-database migration tools must handle data type conversions
